    • Constructor Detail

      • Minesweeper

        public Minesweeper()
        This is the constructor for Minesweeper. It generates the playground and afterwards listens to user inputs.

    • Method Detail

      • interpretInput

        public void interpretInput(java.lang.String s)
        This method tries to get 2 coords out of a string. If he finds 2 int from the string splitted by a blank it gives them to input on leftClickOn() TODO make left and right click possible with console inputs.
        Parameters:
        s - - the string to be interpreted

      • leftClickOn

        public void leftClickOn(int coordX,
                        int coordY)
        this method is there to make changes to the program when the players makes either a leftClick on a panel or a console input. The Method checks if the player has lost with his input, if not it changes the panel(s) value. furthermore it shows/updates the playground.
        Parameters:
        coordX - the x-coord for the input
        coordY - the y-coord for the input

      • rightClickOn

        public void rightClickOn(int coordX,
                         int coordY)
        This Method interprets a right click on a panel. Therefore it either sets a flag or removes a flag on the coordX/coordY
        Parameters:
        coordX - the x-coord for the input
        coordY - the y-coord for the input

      • getSCREENSIZE

        public int getSCREENSIZE()
        Returns:
        the final this.SCREENSIZE.
